::: Set, now on the bridge and viewing the battle from the main view, stands 
in disbelife :::

::: Set ::: Damn, we sure did get real popular, real fast! And what about 
these dieties....I have no clue what Shuko is talking about. ( and more 
importantly, do I RP one of them?) 

::: He turned to the main counsol and began typing in several codes. He 
increased the shileds by a few points, and re-routed available power to the 
main auto-guns. That was all he could do from inside the ship. :::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Megatron could see Hell Beast and Jackle from across the hallway. Al he 
did was stare them down, without saying a word. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Are you just going to stare at me the entire time?

::: Megatron ::: Im sure my troops are outside right now. When they free me, 
I will kill you, both of you.

::: Hell Beast ::: Last time I checked, you left your troops to die, and 
Quickstrike was being used as a pin cusion.

::: Megatron ::: Silence. I have a deal with Set. He will deliver me the 
transmetal 2 tech box, and I will give him the location for the vein of 
energon youve been mining for the past year.

::: Hell Beast ::: That is if we get out of here.

::: Megatron nnodded. They were both trapped, and from what they could hear, 
the ship was getting pounded. :::

::: Megatron ::: Very well. Once we get out of here, we go our seperate ways. 
No betrayals.

::: Hell Beast gave a grim smile ::: Of course.

~~~~~~~~~~~

::: The collasal armored turtle marched through the woods followed by 
Transanulas who looked like a midget next to his counterpart. They came 
closer to Quickstrike, only to see another bot with him. :::

::: Marine ::: Is that your idea of an army?

::: Transanulas ::: Uh-no. They must have...dispersed.

::: Before Marine could respond, a huge explosion of gunfire echoed through 
the forest. It was the battle at the newly fallen ship. :::

::: Marine ::: I do belive I have just found a battle. I will go there, 
gather the Predacons together, and overcome there foe!

::: Transanulas ::: You sound like somekind of twisted Silverbolt...all this 
glory and honor!

::: Marine ::: I am a general...and Im suspecting youre a traitor.

::: The spider entered the clearing with Quickstrike. Marine went after the 
other bot while Transanulas took out a med pack to fix up Quickstrike. :::
